survey_name: Parental Satisfaction with Digital Parenting Tools Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from parents on their satisfaction with digital tools designed to assist with parenting tasks, such as scheduling, monitoring, and educational apps for children.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the digital parenting tools you currently use?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels. Ensure the scale is balanced and easy to understand.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the digital parenting tools you currently use?

questions.question_text: Which of the following digital parenting tools do you use? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture the variety of tools used. Include an 'Other' option for tools not listed.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Checkbox (multi-choice). Include a text field for 'Other' responses.

script.question_text: Which of the following digital parenting tools do you use? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What features do you find most valuable in digital parenting tools?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback on preferred features. Encourage detailed responses.

script.question_text: What features do you find most valuable in digital parenting tools?

questions.question_text: How often do you encounter technical issues with the digital parenting tools you use?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point frequency scale to assess technical issues. This helps identify reliability concerns.

script.question_text: How often do you encounter technical issues with the digital parenting tools you use?

questions.question_text: Would you recommend the digital parenting tools you use to other parents?
answer_options: No, I would not recommend them
questions.client_notes: Net Promoter Score (NPS) style question to gauge likelihood of recommendation. Keep options simple and clear.

script.question_text: Would you recommend the digital parenting tools you use to other parents?
answer_options: No, I would not recommend them
